name: Shovel Golf
description:
Might take a little moment to launch, please be patient, but you can press escape to reset game whitout reloading the page Evil pickaxe kidnapped tiny shovel ! 

You must beat him at Shovel Golf together with your family to save your last born ! Your special family members will help you with their abilities :

  • Father has become strong after years of work in the field, and will shoot the ball further than anyone
  • Little brother loves to chew gum and after getting covered in it he now sticks on surfaces
  • Your mother created a jetpack to help the ball go super highhhHH

Controls :

  • Camera with WASD and reset position with R
  • Reset game with escape
  • Space and mouse will be muche necessary

Known bugs:

  • Collision issues, due to the use of the physic engine with very small items

Submission  for Mini Jam Gam #15
Made with Godot4.

Art: Brindill
Music : Menduil
Code: LeCamphrier

Assets : https://analogstudios.itch.io/four-seasons-platformer-tileset

This is our very first game, thanks for playing
